mapper.select: select t1.notice_id as "noticeId" ,t1.notice_title as "noticeTitle" ,t1.notice_serial as "noticeSerial" ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.start_time,"%Y-%m-%d") as "startTime" ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.end_time,"%Y-%m-%d") as "endTime" ,t1.home_popup as "homePopup" ,t1.home_show as "homeShow" ,t1.platform_type as "platformType" ,t1.platform_name as "platformName" ,t1.publish_name as "pulishName" ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.created_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as "createdTime" ,t1.notice_status as "noticeStatus" ,t1.sort_field as "sortField" ,t2.notice_details as "noticeDetails" from tb_notice_info t1 left join tb_notice_details t2 on t1.notice_id=t2.notice_id where 1=1 and t1.record_status = 1 and t1.notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: update tb_notice_info t1 set t1.notice_status =#{noticeStatus}, t1.modifier_account =#{account}, t1.modified_time = now() where t1.notice_id = #{noticeId}
